verses.verse: And the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves together <S%H6950><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, and set up <S%H7931><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> there <S%H776><s%>: and the land was subdued <S%H3533><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>.

And there remained <S%H3498><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> tribes <S%H7626><s%>, which had not yet divided <S%H2505><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, How long are ye slack <S%H7503><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath given you <S%H5414><s%>?

Appoint <S%H3051><s%> for you three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of each tribe <S%H7626><s%>: and I will send <S%H7971><s%> them <S%H6965><s%>, and they shall arise, and walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%>, and describe <S%H3789><s%> it according <S%H6310><s%> to their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>; and they shall come unto me <S%H935><s%>.

And they shall divide <S%H2505><s%> it into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions <S%H2506><s%>: Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> in his border <S%H1366><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall abide <S%H5975><s%> in their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>.

And ye shall describe <S%H3789><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions <S%H2506><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> the description hither to me <S%H3384><s%>; and I will cast lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

For the Levites <S%H3881><s%> have no portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H3550><s%>; for the priesthood of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: and Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave them <S%H5414><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%>: and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> them that went <S%H1980><s%> to describe <S%H3789><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%>, and describe <S%H3789><s%> it <S%H7725><s%>, and come again to me <S%H7993><s%>; and I will cast lots <S%H1486><s%> for you here before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and passed through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, and described <S%H3789><s%> it by cities <S%H5892><s%> into seven <S%H7651><s%> portions <S%H2506><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> unto the camp <S%H4264><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for them in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and there Joshua <S%H3091><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%>.

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and the border <S%H1366><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> between the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>.

And their border <S%H1366><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> through the hill-country <S%H2022><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Beth-aven <S%H1007><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> along from thence to Luz <S%H3870><s%>, to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Luz <S%H3870><s%> (the same is Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>), southward <S%H5045><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to Ataroth-addar <S%H5853><s%>, by the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lieth on the south <S%H5045><s%> of Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> the nether <S%H8481><s%>.

And the border <S%H1366><s%> extended <S%H8388><s%> thence <S%H5437><s%>, and turned about on the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>, from the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>; and the goings out <S%H8444><s%> thereof were at Kiriath-baal <S%H7154><s%> (the same is Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>), a city <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: this was the west <S%H3220><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%>.

And the south <S%H5045><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%> was from the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of Kiriath-jearim <S%H7157><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> to the fountain <S%H4599><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Nephtoah <S%H5318><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, which is in the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>; and it went down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, to the side <S%H3802><s%> of the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> to En-rogel <S%H5883><s%>;

and it extended <S%H8388><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> at En-shemesh <S%H5885><s%>, and went out <S%H3318><s%> to Geliloth <S%H1553><s%>, which is over against <S%H5227><s%> the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Adummim <S%H131><s%>; and it went down <S%H3381><s%> to the stone <S%H68><s%> of Bohan <S%H932><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>;
and it passed along <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, and went down <S%H3381><s%> unto the Arabah <S%H6160><s%>;

and the border <S%H1366><s%> passed along <S%H5674><s%> to the side <S%H3802><s%> of Beth-hoglah <S%H1031><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>; and the goings <S%H8444><s%> out of the border <S%H1366><s%> were at the north <S%H6828><s%> bay <S%H3956><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, at the south <S%H5045><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: this was the south <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>.

And the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> was the border <S%H1379><s%> of it on the east <S%H6924><s%> quarter <S%H6285><s%>. This was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, by the borders <S%H1367><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

Now the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were Jericho <S%H3405><s%>, and Beth-hoglah <S%H1031><s%>, and <S%H6010><s%> Emek-keziz <S%H7104><s%>,
and Beth-arabah <S%H1026><s%>, and Zemaraim <S%H6787><s%>, and Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>,
and Avvim <S%H5761><s%>, and Parah <S%H6511><s%>, and Ophrah <S%H6084><s%>,
and Chephar-ammoni <S%H3726><s%>, and Ophni <S%H6078><s%>, and Geba <S%H1387><s%>; twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, and Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and Beeroth <S%H881><s%>,
and Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%>, and Chephirah <S%H3716><s%>, and Mozah <S%H4681><s%>,
and Rekem <S%H7552><s%>, and Irpeel <S%H3416><s%>, and Taralah <S%H8634><s%>,

and Zelah <S%H6762><s%>, Eleph <S%H507><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> (the same is Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>), Gibeath <S%H1394><s%>, and Kiriath <S%H7157><s%>; fourteen <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>. This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
